name: Water Run Run 🤽: Hero Time 🦸
description:
Water Run Run - Endless Run is a great infinity running game.

Water runs and plays in the jungle. Help Him collect all the coins and run for as long as possible to be number one.

Water Run Run needs help to complete his journey through the jungle and pass the many obstacles on his way.

Don't forget to dodge all obstacles on the way.

Run as fast as possible.

*** Game Features ***

- Colorful & smooth graphics
- Rich background music and sound effects
- Easy controls and gameplay
- Intense and exciting game rhythm
- Face the unknown dangers and fear!
